title: Week 1: Introduction to Data Mining
description: Overview of Data Mining, including its importance and applications.

title: Week 2: Data Types and Data Preparation
description: Exploration of structured vs unstructured data and various data cleaning techniques.

title: Week 3: Overview of Supervised Learning
description: Introduction to classification techniques, specifically decision trees and SVM, with a practical lab on implementing decision trees in Python.

title: Week 4: Advanced Classification Techniques
description: Basics of neural networks and a practical lab on building a neural network.

title: Week 5: Unsupervised Learning Techniques
description: Focus on clustering algorithms like K-means and hierarchical clustering, alongside a practical lab for exploratory data analysis.

title: Week 6: Association Rule Mining
description: Understanding concepts and algorithms such as Apriori and FP-Growth, with a practical lab on market basket analysis.

title: Week 7: Model Evaluation and Metrics
description: Discussion on accuracy, precision, recall, and F1 score, including a practical lab for evaluating classification models.

title: Week 8: Midterm Review and Exam
description: Review session leading up to the midterm examination.

title: Week 9: Ethical Considerations in Data Mining
description: Examining data privacy, security, and algorithm bias through case study discussions.

title: Week 10: Advanced Topics in Data Mining
description: Introduction to deep learning and current trends in data mining and AI.

title: Week 11: Tool Proficiency in Data Mining
description: In-depth exploration of Weka and RapidMiner, including a practical lab on using Weka for data classification.

title: Week 12: Project Workdays
description: Dedicated time for group project work and initial group meetings.

title: Week 13: Communicating Data Findings
description: Skills related to report writing and presentation, enhanced by peer review workshops.

title: Week 14: Project Presentations
description: Presentations of group projects with feedback from peers and instructors.

title: Week 15: Course Summary and Future Trends
description: A review of key concepts covered in the course and an open discussion on the future of data mining.
